Cornucopia_Alembic.Name: Cornucopia_Alembic
Cornucopia_Alembic.Description: Distills flowers, fruits, herbs, and vegetables into essential oils or extracts.

Cornucopia_ButterChurn.Name: Cornucopia_Butter Churn
Cornucopia_ButterChurn.Description: Turns milk or nuts into butter.

Cornucopia_DryingRack.Name: Cornucopia_Drying Rack
Cornucopia_DryingRack.Description: Used to to dry out various flowers and herbs.

Cornucopia_Extruder.Name: Cornucopia_Extruder
Cornucopia_Extruder.Description: Turns flour into noodles and honey into wax!

Cornucopia_FermentingJar.Name: Cornucopia_Fermenting Jar
Cornucopia_FermentingJar.Description: This stone jar is of a foreign design. It's used for a different fermentation process.

Cornucopia_GlassJar.Name: Cornucopia_Glass Jar
Cornucopia_GlassJar.Description: A jar to ferment non-alcoholic beverages. Turns mushrooms and tea into kombucha.

Cornucopia_Grinder.Name: Cornucopia_Grinder
Cornucopia_Grinder.Description: Use it to grind produce into valuable goods and spices.

Cornucopia_IceCreamMachine.Name: Cornucopia_Ice Cream Machine
Cornucopia_IceCreamMachine.Description: A machine for making homemade ice cream.

Cornucopia_Infuser.Name: Cornucopia_Infuser
Cornucopia_Infuser.Description: A chemical apparatus for infusing liquers and schnapps.

Cornucopia_Smoker.Name: Cornucopia_Smoker
Cornucopia_Smoker.Description: Use it to smoke meat and fish.

Cornucopia_SoapPress.Name: Cornucopia_Soap Press
Cornucopia_SoapPress.Description: A machine that can be used to press soap blocks of various kinds.

Cornucopia_Still.Name: Cornucopia_Still
Cornucopia_Still.Description: A distillation system used to make liquor.

Cornucopia_SorbetMachine.Name: Cornucopia_Sorbet Machine
Cornucopia_SorbetMachine.Description: A machine for making homemade sorbet.

Cornucopia_VinegarKeg.Name: Cornucopia_Vinegar Keg
Cornucopia_VinegarKeg.Description: A smaller keg used to make tart vinegars.

Cornucopia_YogurtJar.Name: Cornucopia_Yogurt Jar
Cornucopia_YogurtJar.Description: A jar to allow milk to ferment into yogurt.
